summary: replaces the Nightingale Cape and parts on the hood in CAMO style!
descriptionHtml:
Hi there, i am starting a Retexture of all guards in towns, just for own reason.

- This mod does: Replaces the Nightingale Cape and parts on the hood in CAMO style!
-Only Female, right now MALE on its way
-Changelog-

1.0
> replaces the Cape and parts of the Hood/helmet in CAMO style, 
*ife poeple requesting for more parts/armor i will add more!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Add youre thoughts, i need feedback, should i replace the yellow towel thing too? with a higher resolution one?
>Maybe it could be big, if people like it and post request! (:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------==

MOD USED:
Aesthetic Lighting ENB
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4973
